title: How much does web development/design cost ?
body: The cost of web development can vary greatly depending on the size and complexity of the project. Some factors that may affect the cost of web development include the number of pages or features required, the design and layout of the site, and the integration of any additional functionality such as e-commerce or social media integration.

title: What is included in a web development pricing plan ?
body: A web development pricing plan typically includes the cost of design and development services. Web development pricing plans does not include domain and future maintenance cost. They are add ons.

title: How do I choose the right pricing plan for my project ?
body: To choose the right web development pricing plan for your project, consider size and complexity of the project, your budget and level of support and maintenance needed.

title: How long does it take to build a website ?
body: The amount of time it takes to build a website depends on the size and complexity of the project. A small, simple website with just a few pages may take a few days to build, while a larger, more complex site with multiple features and functionality may take one week.
